languages.text: Plasteel plates protect the vessel from harm, negating 4 points of {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on each side.

languages.text: 塑钢船板可保护舰船免受伤害，每侧可抵消4点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
